attributes.name: tabLabel
attributes.description: The text displayed on the tab

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The name of an strand-icon displayed next to the tab label

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Relative path to an external html document to lazily load into the tab. The content of the external document must be surrounded by a <template> tag and may use Polymer's binding annotations. Use the loadExternal method if a callback is required when the tab loads.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Whether this tab is active. There should only be one active tab at a time. If no active tab is set, the first tab defaults to active.

methods.name: loadExternal
methods.description: Lazily load this tab's content from an external html document, and attach a callback for when the tab content is loaded. The content of the external document must be surrounded by a <template> tag and may use Polymer's binding annotations.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Relative path to an external html document to lazily load into the tab.

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: Function to call when the tab is loaded. The template instance is passed as an argument to the callback, useful when accessing properties on the current binding scope is needed.

detail.name: label
detail.description: The text label of the tab that fired the event

detail.name: target
detail.description: Reference to the tab that fired the event
